name: floatsqroot
notes: This function raises a “domain” error if the input value is negative. You may use floatabs to get the absolute (positive) value.
description: Calculates the square root of given value.

params_body.name: value
params_body.description: The value to calculate the square root of.

return_values: The square root of the input value, as a float.
related_fn:
floatpower: Raises given value to a power of exponent.
 floatlog: Get the logarithm of the float value.
